directions: Whisk the water, yellow mustard, and salt together in a large saucepan. Bring to a boil over medium heat, and stir in the potatoes. Reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer until tender, 25 to 30 minutes. Drain liquid, and serve.
ingredients: 1/2 cup prepared yellow mustard, or to taste
5 large Yukon Gold potatoes, peeled and halved
title: Boiled Mustard Potatoes
